Articles.Content:
It is Monday in Australia, I was wonder how KSP members with Soviet Mod's will be celebrating May Day ?

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/International_Workers%27_Day

It's 2014/05/04 (or 05, depending on your time zone) at the moment, and May Day is on May 1st. "Will be celebrating"? Aren't you a bit late with this one?

Also, why Soviet mods? This is an international holiday.

05-05 Liberation day here in The Netherlands.

(On the 5th of may the German armies capitulated and we were officialy out of the war).

30 years later, after nine and a half months, my mother was liberated of me

Either way, this May Day is a celebration all around for me

In Mexico & US, it is Cinco de Mayo today; celebrated for a few reasons. Not sure what mods people will use to set it apart from other days.

Edit: Maybe it would be a good day for that v. 0.24 release.

Edited May 5, 2014 by Dispatcher
May 5th is something else. May 1st is Labor Day, rememberance of workers massacre in Chicago 1886.
